article_node.title: What grocery stores are open today? See Labor Day hours for Hy-Vee, Fareway, and more
article_node.summary: Labor Day, observed on the first Monday of September, marks the end of summer and honors American workers. While banks, post offices, and the stock market close, most national grocery chains, retail stores, and restaurants remain open, though hours vary by location. The holiday’s origins trace back to 1882 labor movements, culminating in federal recognition in 1894.
